channel.title: Projects on Neha Mallikarjuna
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Neha Mallikarjuna

item.title: Project 1: Personal Finance Dashboard using Power BI
item.description: A Dashboard that helps anyone to track their Personal finance built using Power BI. Build the dataset by categorizing your finance as Income,Expense and Saving. Used features of Power BI like DAX formulas, Measures and Visualizations to build the Dashboard. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: E-Commerce Sales Dashboard
item.description: Background E-commerce is fast gaining ground as an accepted and used business paradigm. More and more business houses are implementing web sites providing functionality for performing commercial transactions over the web. It is reasonable to say that the process of shopping on the web is becoming commonplace. Objective An Online E-Commerce Company wants to design a Sales dashboard to analyze the sales based on various product categories.
